product_name: White Sierra Swamp Insect Shield Shirt - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Swamp Insect Shield(R) shirt protects you from the harsh rays of the sun and the hungry bites of the bugs. Plus, it's breathable, wicks moisture and dries fast for great comfort. Sanded woven nylon fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel repels mosquitoes, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges (no-see-ums). Insect Shield apparel is effective through 70 washes (do not dry clean). Rear mesh yoke vent circulates air to keep you drier and more comfortable. The White Sierra Swamp Insect Shield shirt has a chest pocket with a hidden zipper. Special buy.
short_description: The White Sierra Swamp Insect Shield(R) shirt protects you from the harsh rays of the sun and the hungry bites of the bugs. Plus, it's breathable, wicks moisture and dries fast for great comfort.
